info.name: WF-NoSQL-MERN
info.description:
#This is a complete API documention for MovieDB-MERN

[https://github.com/KartavyaY/MovieDB-MERN](https://github.com/KartavyaY/MovieDB-MERN)

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST "http://localhost:5001/api/users/profile" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_FIREBASE_JWT_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email": "test@example.com", "displayName": "Test User"}'

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST "http://localhost:5001/api/users/watchlist" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_FIREBASE_JWT_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"movieId": 123}'
